data.description: A POE component for building IRC clients
data.communities: #poe @ irc.perl.org, poe@perl.org, the POE wiki, anywhere POE-ish.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module has actually been on CPAN for over 3 years now, but
    PAUSE is giving me a "no modules registered to FIMM" error when I
    try to edit its metadata. Did I forget to register it, or is this
    just some sort of database weirdness? No idea.

    Actually, the reason I wanted to make sure it was registered is
    because I'm handing its maintainership over to Chris Williams
    (BINGOS). Personal reasons, lack of time, etc. It deserves someone
    who will actually manage a new release once every couple of months.
